code: @Override public String toString() {     return "failed shard, shard " + routingEntry + ", message [" + message + "], failure [" + ExceptionsHelper.detailedMessage(failure) + "], markAsStale [" + markAsStale + "]". }

comment: /**  * The shard routing entry for the failed shard.  */
code: /**  * The shard routing entry for the failed shard.  */ public ShardRouting getRoutingEntry() {     return routingEntry. }

comment: /**  * The failure message, if available, explaining why the shard failed.  */
code: /**  * The failure message, if available, explaining why the shard failed.  */ @Nullable public String getMessage() {     return message. }

comment: /**  * The exception, if present, causing the shard to fail.  */
code: /**  * The exception, if present, causing the shard to fail.  */ @Nullable public Exception getFailure() {     return failure. }

comment: /**  * Whether or not to mark the shard as stale (eg. removing from in-sync set) when failing the shard.  */
code: /**  * Whether or not to mark the shard as stale (eg. removing from in-sync set) when failing the shard.  */ public boolean markAsStale() {     return markAsStale. }
